name: IGD_Sneaky0.7
description:
Run in Chrome

Objective: 

 Sneak your way into the top floors of a secure complex by taking a combination of elevators. Find and enter the next elevator to beat the level and continue moving up the building. Stay in the shadows and don't trip any alarms!

Controls:

WASD to move,  E to operate elevator, click to throw EMP grenades, space to dash.

You'll really need those EMP's on the later levels
